Birdies Cafe
Events Menu

Where hungry birds of a feather flock together!

Are you feeling peckish?

Birdies Cafe is an Americana-themed restaurant in Bend, Oregon, serving breakfast and lunch 7 days a week.

Have a look at our menu, read our story, check out some of the events we host or read about our work with animals.

Location

We’re located on the west side of Bend near Central Oregon Community College.

1444 NW College Way Ste. 1, Bend, OR 97703

Hours

Open 7 days a week from 7 a.m. to 2-ish.

Contact

Phone: 541-728-0753

Email: birdiescafebend@outlook.com

Facebook: @BirdiesCafeBend
